net.beaconcontroller.routing.apsp

Class AllPairsShortestPathRoutingEngineImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.beaconcontroller.routing.apsp.AllPairsShortestPathRoutingEngineImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IRoutingEngine, ITopologyAware

    public class AllPairsShortestPathRoutingEngineImpl
extends Object
implements IRoutingEngine, ITopologyAware
    Implementation of the APSP algorithm by Demetrescu and Italiano.
    Author:
    David Erickson (daviderickson@cs.stanford.edu)

      • subPath

        protected Route subPath(Route route,
            boolean isLeft)
        Returns the subPath of the given route, namely l(route) or r(route) as given in the algorithm. The returned Route is a clone of the supplied Route and safe for modification.
        Parameters:
        route -
        isLeft -
        Returns:
